duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage cross-functional projects from product/technology roadmap to product and solution delivery, covering a range of projects including the integration of existing processes into enterprise CRM platforms and the sunsetting of legacy applications.
Work with various departments across the enterprise to identify existing processes and determine the level of effort to map them into the new platforms.
Engage with the Development Team to design and migrate the processes to the appropriate platform.
Plan and execute the decommission of MS Dynamics and the data preservation.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field (PMP Certification preferred)
